TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Sailing[COLOR_REVERT] allows the creation of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] naval unit and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydock[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]navigation à voile avancée[COLOR_REVERT] permet de fabriquer des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]trirèmes[COLOR_REVERT] et des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cales sèches[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fortgeschrittene Seefahrt[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht die Errichtung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trieren[COLOR_REVERT] und den Bau von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trockendocks[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]navigazione avanzata[COLOR_REVERT] permette la reazione della [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]trireme[COLOR_REVERT] e del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cantiere navale[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Navegación a vela avanzada[COLOR_REVERT] permite la creación de la unidad naval del [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trirreme[COLOR_REVERT] y el edificio del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Astillero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Improved Formations I[COLOR_REVERT] allows the creation of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hoplite[COLOR_REVERT] unit, which is superior to the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]formations améliorées I[COLOR_REVERT] permettent de créer des unités d'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]hoplites[COLOR_REVERT], supérieures aux [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]lanciers.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Verbesserten Formationen I[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglichen die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hopliten[COLOR_REVERT], welche den üblichen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Speerkämpfern[COLOR_REVERT] überlegen sind.
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]formazioni migliorate I[COLOR_REVERT] permettono la creazione dell'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]oplita[COLOR_REVERT], più potente rispetto al [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]lanciere[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Formaciones mejoradas I[COLOR_REVERT] permiten la creación de la unidad del [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hoplita[COLOR_REVERT], que es superior al [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Improved Formations II[COLOR_REVERT] allows the creation of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Phalanx[COLOR_REVERT] unit, which is superior to the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hoplite[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Encampment[COLOR_REVERT] building, which increases ground units' experience.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]formations améliorées II[COLOR_REVERT] permettent de créer des unités de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]phalanges[COLOR_REVERT], supérieures aux [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]lanciers[COLOR_REVERT] et aux [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]hoplites[COLOR_REVERT]. Elles permettent aussi de construire des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]camps militaires[COLOR_REVERT], qui augmentent l'expérience des unités terrestres.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Verbesserten Formationen II[COLOR_REVERT] gewährleisten die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Phalanxen[COLOR_REVERT], welche den üblichen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Speerkämpfern[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hopliten[COLOR_REVERT] überlegen sind. Außerdem ermöglichen sie den Bau von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ausbildungskasernen[COLOR_REVERT], die einen Erfahrungsanstieg für Bodentruppen bewirken.
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]formazioni migliorate II[COLOR_REVERT] permettono la creazione della [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]falange[COLOR_REVERT], più potente rispetto al [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]lanciere[COLOR_REVERT] e all'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]oplita[COLOR_REVERT]. Essa inoltre consente la costruzione dell'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]accampamento militare[COLOR_REVERT], che incrementa l'esperienza delle unità terrestri.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Formaciones mejoradas II[COLOR_REVERT] permiten la creación de la unidad de la [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Falange[COLOR_REVERT], que es superior al [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancero[COLOR_REVERT] y al [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hoplita[COLOR_REVERT]. También permiten construir el edificio del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Campamento militar[COLOR_REVERT], que aumenta la experiencia de las unidades terrestres.

TEXT.English: Advanced Flight
"Oh! I have slipped the surly bonds of Earth - Put out my hand and touched the Face of God." - John Gillespie Magee, Junior
TEXT.French: "Je me suis libéré des emprises de la terre. - J'ai tendu la main et j'ai caressé le visage de Dieu." - John Gillespie Magee, Junior
TEXT.German: "Ach! Ich bin den rauen Banden der Erde entglitten - ich streckte meine Hand aus und berührte das Antlitz Gottes." - John Gillespie Magee, Junior
TEXT.Italian: "Oh! Sono scivolato via dai rozzi legami della Terra - Ho allungato la mano e ho toccato il Volto di Dio." - John Gillespie Magee, Junior
TEXT.Spanish: "¡Oh! Me he librado de las amargas cadenas de la Tierra. - He estirado la mano y tocado el rostro de Dios". - John Gillespie Magee Junior

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Flight[COLOR_REVERT] allows the training of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunships[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jet Fighters[COLOR_REVERT]. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Stable[COLOR_REVERT] Building.
Aesthetics
"Art for art's sake is an empty phrase. Art for the sake of truth, art for the sake of the good and the beautiful, that is the faith I am searching for." - George Sand
TEXT.French: "L'art pour l'art est un mot creux. L'art pour la vérité, l'art pour le Bien et le beau, voilà la foi que je recherche." - George Sand
TEXT.German: "Kunst um der Kunst Willen ist eine leere Floskel. Kunst um der Wahrheit Willen, Kunst um des Guten und des Schönen Willen, das ist der Glaube, nach dem ich suche." - George Sand
TEXT.Italian: "Arte per amore dell'arte è una frase senza senso. Arte per amore della verità, arte per amore del buono e del bello, questa è la fede che vado cercando". - George Sand
TEXT.Spanish: "Hablar del arte por el arte es no decir nada. El arte existe por la verdad, por el bien y por la belleza, y ésa es la fe que yo busco". - George Sand

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Aesthetics[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shwedagon Paya[COLOR_REVERT], and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Khajuraho[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.
Agriculture
"Oh farmers, pray that your summers be wet and your winters clear." - Virgil
TEXT.French: "Oh, paysan, prie afin que tes étés soient humides et tes hivers secs." - Virgile
TEXT.German: "Nassen Sommer kann auch der Herbst nicht trocknen." - Bauernregel
TEXT.Italian: "Oh contadini, pregate perché le vostre estati non siano aride e i vostri inverni rigidi.." - Virgilio
TEXT.Spanish: "Oh, campesinos, rezad para que en vuestros veranos llueva y vuestros inviernos sean despejados." - Virgilio

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Agriculture[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farm[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Alphabet
"Words have the power to both destroy and heal. When words are both true and kind, they can change our world." - The Buddha
TEXT.French: "Les mots ont le pouvoir de détruire et de soigner. Lorsqu'ils sont justes et généreux, ils peuvent changer le monde." - Bouddha
TEXT.German: "Worte haben die Kraft zu zerstören oder zu heilen. Wenn Worte wahr und zugleich gütig sind, können sie unsere Welt verändern." - Buddha
TEXT.Italian: "Le parole hanno il potere di distruggere e di creare. Quando le parole sono sincere e gentili, possono cambiare il mondo." - Budda
TEXT.Spanish: "Las palabras tienen el poder de destruir y sanar. Cuando las palabras son buenas y sinceras tienen el poder de cambiar el mundo." - Buda

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alphabet[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to trade technologies with other civilizations and allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spies[COLOR_REVERT]. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City States[COLOR_REVERT] Civic.
Animal Husbandry
"Blessed shall be the fruit of thy cattle, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep." - The Bible, Deut. 28:4
TEXT.French: "Bénis seront le fruit de ton bétail, le fruit de tes entrailles et la laine de tes brebis." - La Bible, Deutéronome 28:4
TEXT.German: "Gesegnet wird sein der Ertrag deines Ackers und die Jungtiere deines Viehs, deiner Rinder und deiner Schafe." - Die Bibel, Deut. 28:4
TEXT.Italian: "Sia benedetto il frutto delle mandrie di bovini e delle greggi di pecore." - La Bibbia, Deut. 28:4
TEXT.Spanish: "Bendito el fruto de tu vientre, y el fruto de tu bestia, la cría de tus vacas, y los rebaños de tus ovejas." - La Biblia, Deuteronomio 28:4

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Animal Husbandry[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pasture[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement and reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horse[COLOR_REVERT] Resource.
Archery
"Do not throw the arrow which will return against you." - Kurdish Proverb
TEXT.French: "Ne lance pas la flèche qui se retournera contre toi !" - Proverbe kurde
TEXT.German: "Schieße keinen Pfeil, der zu dir zurückkehren könnte." - Kurdisches Sprichwort
TEXT.Italian: "Non scagliare la freccia che ti si rivolterà contro." - Proverbio Curdo
TEXT.Spanish: "No dispares la flecha que pueda volverse contra ti." - Proverbio kurdo

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Archery[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archers[COLOR_REVERT].
Artillery
"Artillery adds dignity to what would otherwise be a vulgar brawl." - Frederick the Great
TEXT.French: "L'artillerie confère un peu de dignité à ce qui ne serait que vulgaire bagarre !" - Frédéric le Grand
TEXT.German: "Die Artillerie verleiht einem vulgären Gemetzel Würde." - Friedrich der Große
TEXT.Italian: "L'artiglieria aggiunge dignità a quella che altrimenti sarebbe una volgare rissa." - Federico il Grande
TEXT.Spanish: "La artillería da dignidad a lo que, de otro modo, sería una vulgar pelea." - Federico el Grande

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT].
Assembly Line
"People can have the Model T in any color - so long as it's black." - Henry Ford
TEXT.French: "Les gens peuvent choisir la couleur de leur voiture, pourvu que ce soit noir." - Henry Ford
TEXT.German: "Unser Modell T ist in jeder Farbe lieferbar, vorausgesetzt sie ist schwarz." - Henry Ford
TEXT.Italian: "La gente può avere il modello T in qualsiasi colore, a patto che sia nero." - Henry Ford
TEXT.Spanish: "Los clientes pueden tener un coche del color que quieran, siempre que sea negro." - Henry Ford

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Assembly Line[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infantry[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT] Building, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder and obsoletes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder.
Astronomy
[ICON_BULLET]Allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=UNIT_SETTLER]Settlers[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] to be built on any continent
"Astronomy compels the soul to look upwards and leads us from this world to another." - Plato
TEXT.French: "L'astronomie oblige l'âme à se tourner vers les cieux et nous guide de ce monde vers un autre." - Platon
TEXT.German: "Die Astronomie zwingt die Seele, nach oben zu schauen, und führt sie in eine andere Welt." - Plato
TEXT.Italian: "L'astronomia obbliga l'anima a guardare in alto e ci conduce da un mondo a un altro." - Platone
TEXT.Spanish: "La Astronomía obliga al alma a mirar hacia arriba y nos lleva de este mundo a otro." - Platón

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleons[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frigates[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ship of the Lines[COLOR_REVERT]. It allows [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Settlers[COLOR_REVERT] to be built on any continent, enables trading on the ocean, allows the spread of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Trading Companies[COLOR_REVERT], allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatory[COLOR_REVERT] Building and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Moai Statues[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.
Banking
"Banking establishments are more dangerous than standing armies." - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.French: "Les établissements bancaires sont plus dangereux qu'une armée en campagne." - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.German: "Banken sind gefährlicher als stehende Armeen." - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.Italian: "Gli istituti bancari sono più pericolosi di un esercito sul piede di guerra." - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.Spanish: "Los bancos son más peligrosos para nuestras libertades que los ejércitos en armas." - Thomas Jefferson

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Banking[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT] Building. It allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Porcelain Tower[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mercantilism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT].
You may purchase a galley for free if you do not have any naval units. This prevents you from becoming trapped on an island. Galley's have a transport capacity of 5 units and can move across oceans.
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez obtenir gratuitement une galère si vous n'avez aucune unité navale. Cela vous permettra de ne pas rester piégé sur une île. Les galères peuvent transporter jusqu'à 5 unités et traverser les océans.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie keine Marineeinheiten besitzen, können Sie ein kostenloses Kriegsschiff erwerben, um zu verhindern, dass Sie möglicherweise auf einer Insel festsitzen. Kriegsschiffe können bis zu 5 Einheiten transportieren und sind hochseetauglich.
TEXT.Italian: Se non possiedi unità navali, puoi acquistare gratuitamente una galea per impedirti di rimanere intrappolato su un'isola. Le galee possono trasportare 5 unità e solcare gli oceani.
TEXT.Spanish: Puedes adquirir una galera gratuita si careces de unidades navales. Eso impedirá que te quedes atrapado en una isla. Las galeras tienen capacidad para transportar a 5 unidades y pueden moverse por las casillas de océano.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Base Cost:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grundkosten:[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Biology
"It is not the strongest of the species that survive, but the one most responsive to change." - Charles Darwin
TEXT.French: "Ce n'est pas l'espèce la plus puissante qui survit mais celle qui s'adapte le mieux au changement." - Charles Darwin
TEXT.German: "Nicht die stärksten Spezies werden überleben, sondern jene, die sich Veränderungen am besten anpassen können." - Charles Darwin
TEXT.Italian: "Non sopravvive la specie più forte, ma quella più adatta al cambiamento." - Charles Darwin
TEXT.Spanish: "No sobrevive la especie más fuerte, sino la más adaptable al cambio." - Charles Darwin

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Biology[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farms[COLOR_REVERT] without [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Irrigation[COLOR_REVERT] as well as the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder. It increases the food production of all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farm[COLOR_REVERT] Improvements by 1, allows the removal of Jungles and allows the spread of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cereal Industry[COLOR_REVERT].
Bronze Working
"It is entirely seemly for a young man killed in battle to lie mangled by the bronze spear. In his death all things appear fair." - Homer
TEXT.French: "Un jeune homme tombé dans la bataille peut afficher la pointe d'airain fichée dans son corps car rien ne choque chez un mort." - Homère
TEXT.German: "So mancher Jüngling fällt in der Schlacht, zermalmt von bronzenem Speer. Im Tode so scheint sein Schicksal vollbracht." - Homer
TEXT.Italian: "Per un giovane è decoroso morire in battaglia trafitto da una lancia di bronzo. Nella morte, tutte le cose sembrano giuste." - Omero
TEXT.Spanish: "Yacer en el suelo, habiendo sido atravesado en la lid por el agudo bronce, es decoroso para un joven, y cuanto de él pueda verse todo es bello, a pesar de la muerte." - Homero

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bronze Working[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] resource, allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axemen[COLOR_REVERT] and allows the removal of Forests.
Calendar
"For everything there is a season and a time for every purpose under heaven." - Ecclesiastes
TEXT.French: "A toute chose sa saison, et à toute affaire sous les cieux, son temps." - Le livre de l'Ecclésiaste
TEXT.German: "Für alles gibt es eine Stunde. Und für jedes Vorhaben unter dem Himmel eine Zeit." - Ekklesiastes
TEXT.Italian: "Esistono una stagione e un tempo per ogni cosa." - Ecclesiaste
TEXT.Spanish: "Todo tiene su tiempo, y todo cuanto se hace bajo el sol tiene su hora." - La Biblia, Eclesiastés

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Calendar[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Plantation[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slave Plantation[COLOR_REVERT] Improvements. It allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum of Maussollos[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chinampa[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It also centers the World Map and enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Agrarianism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic. The first player to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Calendar[COLOR_REVERT] founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Can Construct[SPACE]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut construire :[SPACE]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Ermöglicht Bau von:[SPACE]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Può costruire[SPACE]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Puede erigir[SPACE]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Create[SPACE]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut créer :[SPACE]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann Folgendes erschaffen:[SPACE]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Può creare[SPACE]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Se puede crear[SPACE]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Train[SPACE]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut entraîner :[SPACE]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Ausbildung von:[SPACE]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Può addestrare[SPACE]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Puede preparar[SPACE]

TEXT.English: Chemistry
"Chemistry means the difference between poverty and starvation and the abundant life." - Robert Brent
TEXT.French: "La chimie est ce qui sépare la pauvreté et la famine de l'abondance." - Robert Brent
TEXT.German: "Die Chemie macht den Unterschied zwischen Armut und Hunger und einem Leben im Überfluss." - Robert Brent
TEXT.Italian: "La chimica rappresenta la differenza tra povertà e fame e una vita piena di abbondanza." - Robert Brent
TEXT.Spanish: "La Química supone la diferencia entre la pobreza y la hambruna y una vida llena de abundancia." - Robert Brent

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemistry[COLOR_REVERT] allows the training of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadiers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ship of the Lines[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases production from all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Workshops[COLOR_REVERT] by 1 and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Technology Advisor
TEXT.French: Conseiller scientifique
TEXT.German: Technologieberater
TEXT.Italian: Consigliere tecnologico
TEXT.Spanish: Consejero de tecnología

TEXT.English: Civil Service
"The bureaucracy is expanding to meet the needs of the expanding bureaucracy" - Unknown
TEXT.French: "La bureaucratie grandit pour répondre aux besoins croissants de la bureaucratie grandissante." - Inconnu
TEXT.German: "Die Bürokratie wurde erfunden, um die Bedürfnisse der Bürokratie zu stillen." - Unbekannt
TEXT.Italian: "La burocrazia si espande per soddisfare i bisogni di una burocrazia in espansione." - Anonimo
TEXT.Spanish: "La burocracia se expande para satisfacer las necesidades de una burocracia en expansión." - Anónimo

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Civil Service[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Absolutism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT]. It allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farms[COLOR_REVERT] to spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Irrigation[COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Topkapi Palace[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Code of Laws
"To bring about the rule of righteousness in the land, so that the strong should not harm the weak." - Hammurabi's Code; Prologue
TEXT.French: "Pour accompagner le règne des justes sur la Terre afin que le fort jamais ne brutalise le faible." - Code d'Hammurabi, Prologue
TEXT.German: "Es wird Zeit, dem Land Gesetze zu schenken, auf dass die Reichen die Armen nicht unterdrücken." - Codex Hammurabi, Prolog
TEXT.Italian: "Per portare regole e giustizia, in modo che il più forte non possa nuocere al più debole." - Codice di Hammurabi, Prologo
TEXT.Spanish: "Para traer el imperio de la Justicia al país y que los fuertes no perjudiquen a los débiles." - Preámbulo del Código de Hammurabi

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Code of Laws[COLOR_REVERT] allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT] Building, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Center[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Kukulkan[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Combustion
"Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car." - E. B. White
TEXT.French: "Dans la vie, tout est ailleurs, et on ne peut y aller qu'en voiture !" - E. B. White
TEXT.German: "Im Leben ist alles irgendwo anders. Und hin kommt man mit dem Auto." - E. B. White
TEXT.Italian: "Ogni cosa della vita si trova da qualche parte ed è raggiungibile in automobile." - E. B. White
TEXT.Spanish: "Todo en la vida está en otra parte, y allí se llega en coche." - E. B. White

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Combustion[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Transports[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Airships[COLOR_REVERT]. Allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Public Transportation[COLOR_REVERT] Building, the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Well[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement and allows the spread of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil Industry[COLOR_REVERT]. It obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Whale[COLOR_REVERT] Resource and the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Compass
"The wisest men follow their own direction." - Euripides
TEXT.French: "L'homme avisé suit sa propre direction." - Euripide
TEXT.German: "Ein weiser Mann folgt nur sich selbst." - Euripides
TEXT.Italian: "Gli uomini più saggi conoscono la direzione in cui andare." - Euripide
TEXT.Spanish: "Los hombres más sabios siguen su propio rumbo." - Eurípides

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] allows the training of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorers[COLOR_REVERT]. It allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]High Sea Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] Building. It obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] Wonder.
Composites
"The whole is greater than the sum of its parts." - Aristotle
TEXT.French: "La totalité est plus que la somme des parties." - Aristote
TEXT.German: "Das Ganze ist mehr als die Summe seiner Teile." - Aristoteles
TEXT.Italian: "Il risultato è migliore della somma delle sue parti." - Aristotele
TEXT.Spanish: "Un todo es mayor que la suma de sus partes." - Aristóteles

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Composites[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Main Battle Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] and allows the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alchemist III[COLOR_REVERT] Promotion. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]SS Casing[COLOR_REVERT] Spaceship Part.
Computers
"Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window." - Steve Wozniak
TEXT.French: "Méfiez-vous d'un ordinateur que vous ne pouvez pas jeter par la fenêtre." - Steve Wozniak
TEXT.German: "Vertraue keinem Computer, den du nicht aus dem Fenster werfen kannst." - Steve Wozniak
TEXT.Italian: "Mai fidarsi di un computer che non si può lanciare fuori dalla finestra." - Steve Wozniak
TEXT.Spanish: "Nunca te fíes de un ordenador que no puedas tirar por la ventana." - Steve Wozniak

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Computers[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Main Battle Tanks[COLOR_REVERT], allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT] Building, allows the construction of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Internet[COLOR_REVERT] Project and allows the spread of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Computer Industry[COLOR_REVERT]. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT].
Constitution
"No freeman shall be taken, imprisoned, or in any other way destroyed, except by the lawful judgment of his peers." - The Magna Carta
TEXT.French: "Aucun homme libre ne sera saisi, emprisonné ou exécuté, de quelque manière que ce soit, sans un jugement légal de ses pairs." - La Magna Carta
TEXT.German: "Kein freier Mann darf eingesperrt oder bestraft werden ohne ein rechtmäßiges Urteil seiner Standesgenossen." - Magna Carta
TEXT.Italian: "Nessun uomo libero può essere sequestrato, imprigionato o annullato in qualsiasi modo, ma deve essere giudicato solamente per le sue azioni." - La Magna Carta
TEXT.Spanish: "Ningún hombre libre podrá ser detenido o encarcelado o privado de sus derechos de cualquier otra forma, sino en virtud de sentencia judicial de sus pares y con arreglo a la ley del reino." - La Carta Magna

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Constitution[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Representation[COLOR_REVERT] civic, allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]La Mezquita[COLOR_REVERT]
Construction
"And on the pedestal these words appear: 'My name is Ozymandias, king of kings: Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!' Nothing beside remains." - Percy Bysshe Shelley
TEXT.French: "Et sur le piédestal apparaissent ces mots : 'Je suis Ozymandias, le Roi des Rois ; contemple mon oeuvre, Ô Tout-puissant, et désespère !'" - Percy Bysshe Shelley
TEXT.German: "Und auf dem Sockel erscheinen folgende Worte: 'Mein Name ist Ozymandias, König der Könige: Betrachtet mein Werk, ihr Mächtigen, und verzweifelt!'" - Percy Bysshe Shelley
TEXT.Italian: "E sul mio piedistallo saranno incise queste parole: 'Il mio nome è Ozymandias, re dei re; guarda il mio operato e ammutolisci!'" - Percy Bysshe Shelley
TEXT.Spanish: "Y en el pedestal se leen estas palabras: 'Mi nombre es Ozymandias, rey de reyes: ¡Contemplad mis obras, poderosos, y perded la esperanza!' " - Percy Bysshe Shelley

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT], allows Bridge Building and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Wall[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theodosian Walls[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Machu Picchu[COLOR_REVERT]
Corporation
"Corporation, n. An ingenious device for obtaining individual profit without individual responsibility." - Ambrose Bierce
TEXT.French: "Société commerciale, définition : dispositif ingénieux favorisant le profit individuel sans responsabilité individuelle." - Ambrose Pierce
TEXT.German: "Unternehmen sind eine Möglichkeit, ohne individuelle Verantwortlichkeit Gewinne zu erwirtschaften." - Ambrose Bierce
TEXT.Italian: "Corporazione, sostantivo. Un meccanismo ingegnoso per conquistare profitti individuali senza responsabilità individuali." - Ambrose Bierce
TEXT.Spanish: "Persona jurídica, f. Der. Un ingenioso artificio para obtener ganancia individual sin responsabilidad individual." - Ambrose Bierce

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] adds an additional trade route to all cities, enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Free Market[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Market[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder.
Currency
"Everything is worth what its purchaser will pay for it." - Publius Syrus
TEXT.French: "Toute chose a la valeur que son acquéreur est prêt à payer." - Publius Syrus
TEXT.German: "Jedes Ding ist wert, was der Käufer dafür zahlen will." - Publius Syrus
TEXT.Italian: "Ogni cosa vale il prezzo che un acquirente è disposto a pagare." - Publilio Siro
TEXT.Spanish: "Las cosas valen lo que su comprador esté dispuesto a pagar por ellas." - Publio Siro

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Currency[COLOR_REVERT] adds an additional trade route to all cities and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] Building. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mercenaries[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, allows you to trade gold with other civilizations and allows the spread of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk Route[COLOR_REVERT].
Democracy
"It has been said that democracy is the worst form of government except all the others that have been tried." - Winston Churchill
TEXT.French: "On a dit que la démocratie est la pire forme de gouvernement à l'exception de toutes les autres." - Winston Churchill
TEXT.German: "Man sagt, die Demokratie ist die schlechteste Staatsform, mit Ausnahme aller anderen." - Winston Churchill
TEXT.Italian: "È stato detto che la democrazia è la peggior forma di governo all'infuori di tutte quelle che sono state già tentate precedentemente." - Winston Churchill
TEXT.Spanish: "La democracia es el peor de los regímenes, con excepción de todos los demás que se han probado." - Winston Churchill

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Democracy[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Egalitarianism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Westminster Palace[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.
Divine Right
"I am the state." - Louis XIV
TEXT.French: "L'Etat, c'est moi." - Louis XIV
TEXT.German: "Der Staat bin ich." - Ludwig XIV.
TEXT.Italian: "Lo stato sono io." - Luigi XIV
TEXT.Spanish: "El Estado soy yo." - Luis XIV

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Divine Right[COLOR_REVERT] enables [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fanaticism[COLOR_REVERT], obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT]. It allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dome of the Rock[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It also allows the training of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Religious Persecutor[COLOR_REVERT] Unit. The first player to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Divine Right[COLOR_REVERT] founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT].
Drama
"All the world's a stage, And all the men and women merely players. They have their exits and their entrances; And one man in his time plays many parts. " - William Shakespeare
TEXT.French: "Le monde entier est une immense scène ! Tous, hommes et femmes, des acteurs qui y jouent leurs sorties, qui y jouent leurs entrées ; chacun interprète maints rôles dans sa vie !" - William Shakespeare
TEXT.German: "Die ganze Welt ist Bühne. Und alle Frauen und Männer bloße Spieler. Sie treten auf und gehen wieder ab. Sein Leben lang spielt einer manche Rollen." - William Shakespeare
TEXT.Italian: "Il mondo è un palco, uomini e donne sono solamente attori. Ci sono ingressi e uscite e ciascuno può rivestire ruoli diversi. " - William Shakespeare
TEXT.Spanish: "El mundo es un escenario y los hombres y mujeres que lo pueblan son solo actores. Todos hacen entradas y mutis y diversos papeles en la vida. " - William Shakespeare

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Drama[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to adjust the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Culture[COLOR_REVERT] slider and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Opera House[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Great Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT].
Ecology
"We do not inherit the earth from our ancestors, we borrow it from our children" - Native American Song
TEXT.French: "Nous n'héritons pas de la Terre de nos ancêtres, nous l'empruntons à nos enfants." - Chant amérindien
TEXT.German: "Wir haben die Erde nicht von unseren Vorfahren geerbt, sondern von unseren Kindern geliehen." - Indianerlied
TEXT.Italian: "Non ereditiamo la terra dai nostri antenati, la prendiamo in prestito per i nostri figli." - Canzone dei Nativi Americani
TEXT.Spanish: "La Tierra no es una herencia de nuestros padres, sino un préstamo de nuestros hijos." - Canción de los indígenas americanos

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ecology[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to Scrub [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fallout[COLOR_REVERT] and enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Environmentalism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Recycling Center[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Life Support[COLOR_REVERT] Spaceship Part.
Economics
"Compound interest is the most powerful force in the universe." - Albert Einstein
TEXT.French: "Les intérêts composés sont la plus grande force de tout l'univers." - Albert Einstein
TEXT.German: "Der Zinseszins war die größte Erfindung des menschlichen Denkens." - Albert Einstein
TEXT.Italian: "L'interesse composto è la forza più potente dell'universo." - Albert Einstein
TEXT.Spanish: "El interés compuesto es la fuerza más poderosa de la galaxia." - Albert Einstein

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capitalism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, allows the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder. The first to research [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] receives a free [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] unit.
Education
"There is no wealth like knowledge, no poverty like ignorance." - Ali ibn Abi-Talib
TEXT.French: "Il n'existe plus grande richesse que le savoir, plus grande pauvreté que l'ignorance." - Ali ibn Abi Talib
TEXT.German: "Wissen ist der größte Reichtum und Ignoranz zeugt von Armut." - Ali ibn Abi-Talib
TEXT.Italian: "La conoscenza è sintomo di benessere, l'ignoranza è sintomo di povertà." - Ali ibn Abi-Talib
TEXT.Spanish: "No hay mayor riqueza que el conocimiento ni mayor pobreza que la ignorancia." - Alí ibn Abi-Talib

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT] Building and obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]University of Sankore[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Electricity
"We will make electricity so cheap that only the rich will burn candles." - Thomas Edison
TEXT.French: "L'électricité sera si bon marché que seuls les riches s'éclaireront encore à la bougie." - Thomas Edison
TEXT.German: "Wir machen die Elektrizität so billig, dass nur noch die Reichen Kerzen benutzen!" - Thomas Edison
TEXT.Italian: "Renderemo l'elettricità così economica che solamente i ricchi accenderanno le candele." - Thomas Edison
TEXT.Spanish: "Abarataremos tanto la electricidad que solo los ricos usarán velas." - Thomas Edison

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Electricity[COLOR_REVERT] increases commerce output of all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Windmills[COLOR_REVERT] by 1 and all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Watermills[COLOR_REVERT] by 2 and allows the spread of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Industry[COLOR_REVERT]. It allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bunker[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelter[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plant[COLOR_REVERT] Buildings and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Empire Size:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Reichsgröße:[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Engineering
"A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away." - Antoine de Saint-Exupry
TEXT.French: "La perfection est atteinte non pas parce qu'il n'y a plus rien à ajouter, mais lorsqu'il n'y a plus rien à retirer." - Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
TEXT.German: "Perfektion ist nicht dann erreicht, wenn es nichts mehr hinzuzufügen gibt, sondern wenn man nichts mehr weglassen kann." - Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
TEXT.Italian: "Un progettista sa di aver raggiunto la perfezione non quando non c'è più niente da aggiungere, ma quando non c'è più nulla da eliminare." - Antoine de Saint-Exupry
TEXT.Spanish: "Un diseñador sabe que ha alcanzado la perfección no cuando ya no tiene nada más que añadir, sino cuando no le queda nada más que quitar." - Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Engineering[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikemen[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchets[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Road[COLOR_REVERT] movement and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Topkapi Palace[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Blue Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Fort[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.
[ICON_BULLET]Advances to the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_era[COLOR_REVERT] Era
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Avance à l'époque : [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_era[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Fortschritt zum Zeitalter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_era[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Avanza all'era [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_era[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Avanza a la era [NUM1:del:de la:de los:de las] [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_era[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Fascism
"The great masses of the people... will more easily fall victims to a big lie than to a small one." - Adolf Hitler
TEXT.French: "C'est un fait que les masses avalent plus facilement un gros mensonge qu'un petit." - Adolf Hitler
TEXT.German: "Die meisten Menschen werden leichter Opfer einer großen Lüge als einer kleinen." - deutscher Diktator
TEXT.Italian: "Le grandi masse... sono più propense a cadere vittime di una grande bugia, piuttosto di una piccola." - Adolf Hitler
TEXT.Spanish: "Las grandes masas del pueblo caerán más fácilmente víctimas de una mentira grande que de una pequeña." - Adolf Hitler

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fascism[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Totalitarianism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Paratroopers[COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mount Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. The first to research [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fascism[COLOR_REVERT] receives a free [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] unit
Feudalism
"I will to my lord be true and faithful, and love all which he loves and shun all which he shuns." - Anglo Saxon Oath of Fealty
TEXT.French: "Je jure loyauté et fidélité à mon seigneur, j'aimerai ce qu'il aime et me détournerai de ce dont il se détourne." - Serment d'allégeance anglo-saxon
TEXT.German: "Ich werde meinem Herrn treue Dienste leisten. Seine Feinde sollen auch meine Feinde sein." - Angelsächsischer Treueeid
TEXT.Italian: "Sono devoto e credo nel mio Signore, amo ciò che lui ama e rifuggo ciò che lui rifugge." - Giuramento di fedeltà anglosassone
TEXT.Spanish: "Seré fiel y sincero para con mi señor, y amaré todo lo que ame y abominaré de todo lo que abomine." - Juramento de fidelidad anglosajón

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longbowmen[COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Himeji Castle[COLOR_REVERT]. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalage[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Levy Armies[COLOR_REVERT] Civics and obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Great Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT].
Fiber Optics
"There is a single light of science, and to brighten it anywhere is to brighten it everywhere." - Isaac Asimov
TEXT.French: "La lumière de la science est unique et lorsqu'elle éclaire quelque part, elle éclaire partout." - Isaac Asimov
TEXT.German: "Es gibt nur ein Licht der Wissenschaft, und es irgendwo zu entzünden heißt, es überall zu entzünden." - Isaac Asimov
TEXT.Italian: "Accendendo la luce della scienza da qualche parte, lo si fa ovunque." - Isaac Asimov
TEXT.Spanish: "La ciencia es una sola luz, e iluminar con ella cualquier parte es iluminar con ella el mundo entero." - Isaac Asimov

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fiber Optics[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Cockpit[COLOR_REVERT] Spaceship Part. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Westminster Palace[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
[ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%d1_Num Free Technologies[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
[ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_UnitName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Faire cette découverte avant les autres octroie 1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_UnitName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Der erste Entdecker erhält eine Einheit: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_UnitName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Il primo che scopre questa tecnologia riceve [NUM1:un:una:dei:delle] [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_UnitName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Quien haga primero su descubrimiento recibirá [NUM1:un:una:unos:unas] [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_UnitName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Fishing
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." - Lao Tzu
TEXT.French: "Donne un poisson à un homme et tu le nourris pour un jour, apprends-lui à pêcher et tu le nourris pour toujours." - Lao-Tseu
TEXT.German: "Gib einem Menschen einen Fisch, und du ernährst ihn für einen Tag. Bring ihm bei zu fischen, und du ernährst ihn sein Leben lang." - Laotse
TEXT.Italian: "Un uomo può saziarsi con un pesce al giorno. Un uomo che impara a pescare può saziarsi per tutta la vita." - Lao Tzu
TEXT.Spanish: "Si le das a un hombre un pescado, comerá un día. Si le enseñas a pescar, comerá toda la vida." - Lao Tsé

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fishing[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Work Boats[COLOR_REVERT], allows cities to work water tiles and allows the construction of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT].
Fission

If the radiance of a thousand suns were to burst at once into the sky, that would be like the splendor of the Mighty One... I am become Death, the Shatterer of Worlds. - J. Robert Oppenheimer, quoting "The Bhagavad Gita"
TEXT.French: "Si la splendeur de mille soleils éclatait à la fois dans les cieux, cela serait comparable au rayonnement du grand Etre... Je suis devenu la Mort, le destructeur des mondes." - J. Robert Oppenheimer, citant la Bhagavad Gita
TEXT.German: "Wenn das Licht von tausend Sonnen am Himmel plötzlich bräch' hervor, zu gleicher Zeit - das wäre gleich dem Glanze des Herrlichen ... Ich bin der Tod, der alles raubt, Erschütterer der Welten." - J. Robert Oppenheimer, Zitat aus der "Bhagavad Gita"
TEXT.Italian: Se migliaia di soli illuminassero il cielo sarebbe uno spettacolo di straordinaria potenza... Sono la Morte, Distruttrice di Mondi. - J. Robert Oppenheimer, citando il "Bhagavad Gita"
TEXT.Spanish: "Si el brillo de mil soles refulgiese a la vez en el cielo, sería como el esplendor del Poderoso... Me he convertido en la Muerte, la destructora de mundos." - J. Robert Oppenheimer, citando "El Bhagavad Gita"

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fission[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plant[COLOR_REVERT] Building, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder and the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Manhattan Project[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tactical Nukes[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT].
Flight
"For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return." - Leonardo Da Vinci
TEXT.French: "Car lorsque vous aurez goûté aux beautés du vol, vous parcourrez la Terre les yeux tournés vers le ciel, car vous y serez allé et qu'il vous tardera d'y revenir." - Léonard de Vinci
TEXT.German: "Wenn du einmal das Fliegen empfunden hast, wirst du für immer auf der Erde wandeln mit deinen Augen himmelwärts gerichtet, denn dort bist du gewesen und dort wird es dich immer wieder hinziehen." - Leonardo Da Vinci
TEXT.Italian: "Una volta aver assaporato il volo, quando tornerai sulla terra continuerai a guardare verso il cielo." - Leonardo Da Vinci
TEXT.Spanish: "Una vez hayas probado el vuelo caminarás por la tierra con los ojos alzados hacia el cielo porque ya habrás estado allí y querrás volver." - Leonardo Da Vinci

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Flight[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Paratroopers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carriers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighters[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombers[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airport[COLOR_REVERT] Building.
Fusion
"Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic." - Arthur C. Clarke
TEXT.French: "Une technologie suffisamment sophistiquée ne peut être distinguée de la magie." - Arthur C. Clarke
TEXT.German: "Jede fortgeschrittene Technologie ist anfangs von Magie nicht zu unterscheiden." - Arthur C. Clarke
TEXT.Italian: "Ogni tecnologia sufficientemente avanzata, è indistinguibile dalla magia." - Arthur C. Clarke
TEXT.Spanish: "Cualquier tecnología lo suficientemente avanzada es indistinguible de la magia." - Arthur C. Clarke

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusion[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Engine[COLOR_REVERT] Spaceship Part. The first to research [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusion[COLOR_REVERT] receives a free [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] unit
Future Tech
"The future will be better tomorrow." - Dan Quayle
TEXT.French: "Le futur sera meilleur demain !" - Dan Quayle
TEXT.German: "Morgen wird die Zukunft besser sein." - Dan Quayle
TEXT.Italian: "Domani, il futuro sarà migliore." - Dan Quayle
TEXT.Spanish: "El futuro será mejor mañana." - Dan Quayle

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Future Tech[COLOR_REVERT] increases health and happiness in all your cities.
Genetics
"Soon it will be a sin for parents to have a child which carries the heavy burden of genetic disease." - Bob Edwards
TEXT.French: "Bientôt, ce sera un péché pour des parents d'avoir un enfant souffrant d'une maladie génétique." - Bob Edwards
TEXT.German: "Bald wird es eine Sünde sein, wenn Eltern ein behindertes Kind zur Welt bringen." - Bob Edwards
TEXT.Italian: "Presto sarà un peccato per dei genitori avere figli che portano il fardello di una malattia genetica." - Bob Edwards
TEXT.Spanish: "Pronto será un pecado que los padres tengan hijos que lleven la pesada carga de una enfermedad genética." - Bob Edwards

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Genetics[COLOR_REVERT] increases the health of all your cities. It allows you to construct the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[COLOR_REVERT] Spaceship Part.
[ICON_BULLET]Can be researched by a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_great_person[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut être recherchée par un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_great_person[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann von der Großen Persönlichkeit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_great_person[COLOR_REVERT] erforscht werden
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Può essere ricercata da un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_great_person[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Esta tecnología puede investigarla un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_great_person[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Guilds
"People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for merriment and diversion, but the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public." - Adam Smith
TEXT.French: "Ceux qui partagent le même métier se réunissent rarement, même pour se divertir, mais leur conversation se fait inévitablement au détriment du public." - Adam Smith
TEXT.German: "Geschäftsleute des gleichen Gewerbes kommen selten, selbst zu Festen und zur Zerstreuung, zusammen, ohne dass das Gespräch in einer Verschwörung gegen die Öffentlichkeit endet." - Adam Smith
TEXT.Italian: "È raro che quelli che fanno lo stesso lavoro si riuniscano, nemmeno per divertirsi o fare baldoria, ma la conversazione termina sempre con una cospirazione ai danni della clientela." - Adam Smith
TEXT.Spanish: "Gente del mismo oficio rara vez se reúne, ni tan solo para alegrarse o divertirse, sin que la conversación termine en una conspiración contra el público." - Adam Smith

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT], allow you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT] Building, enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and allows you to construct the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumbermill[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement. It increases production from all workshops by 1 and reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT] Resource.
Gunpowder
"You can get more of what you want with a kind word and a gun than you can with just a kind word." - Al Capone
TEXT.French: "On obtient plus en demandant poliment une arme à la main qu'en demandant juste poliment." - Al Capone
TEXT.German: "Wenn du etwas wirklich willst, musst du deinen Worten mit einer Waffe Nachdruck verleihen." - Al Capone
TEXT.Italian: "Con una parola gentile e una pistola, puoi ottenere di più che con una sola parola gentile." - Al Capone
TEXT.Spanish: "Uno puede conseguir más con una palabra amable y una pistola que solo con una palabra amable." - Al Capone

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gunpowder[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketmen[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassiers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombards[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pinch[COLOR_REVERT] Promotion.
Horseback Riding
"If you speak the truth, have a foot in the stirrup." - Turkish proverb
TEXT.French: "Si tu dis vrai, mets le pied à l'étrier." - Proverbe turc
TEXT.German: "Wer die Wahrheit spricht, sollte besser einen Fuß im Steigbügel haben." - Arabisches Sprichwort
TEXT.Italian: "Se dici il vero, metti un piede nella staffa." - Proverbio Turco
TEXT.Spanish: "Si dices la verdad, ya tienes un pie en el estribo." - Proverbio turco

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Horseback Riding[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephants[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stable[COLOR_REVERT] Building.
Hunting
"If you chase two rabbits, you will lose them both." - Native American Saying
TEXT.French: "Chasse deux lièvres à la fois et tu n'en attraperas aucun." - Proverbe amérindien
TEXT.German: "Der, der zwei Hasen jagt, lässt einen zurück und verliert den anderen." - Indianisches Sprichwort
TEXT.Italian: "Se dai la caccia a due conigli, li perderai entrambi." - Proverbio dei Nativi Americani
TEXT.Spanish: "Si persigues a dos conejos al mismo tiempo, los perderás a ambos." - Dicho de los indígenas americanos

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Hunting[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scouts[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearmen[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to construct the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camp[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement.
Industrialism
"There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: Make the best quality of goods possible at the lowest cost possible, paying the highest wages possible." - Henry Ford
TEXT.French: "L'industriel ne doit obéir qu'à une seule règle : produire des biens de la meilleure qualité possible au moindre coût en payant les plus hauts salaires possibles." - Henry Ford
TEXT.German: "Die wichtigste unternehmerische Regel lautet: Mache möglichst gute Produkte zu möglichst niedrigen Preisen und bezahle möglichst hohe Löhne." - Henry Ford
TEXT.Italian: "Esiste una sola regola per l'imprenditore: fare il miglior prodotto possibile al minor costo possibile, pagando i massimi stipendi possibili." - Henry Ford
TEXT.Spanish: "Para el industrial solo hay una regla, que es la siguiente: hacer los productos de la mejor calidad posible al menor coste posible, pagando los salarios más altos posibles." - Henry Ford

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Battleships[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Park[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empire State Building[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. It also reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminum[COLOR_REVERT] Resource, obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT] Resource and enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ambush[COLOR_REVERT] Promotion.
Iron Working
"You should hammer your iron when it is glowing hot." - Publius Syrus
TEXT.French: "Il faut battre le fer tant qu'il est chaud." - Publius Syrus
TEXT.German: "Man muss das Eisen schmieden, solange es heiß ist." - Publius Syrus
TEXT.Italian: "Dovresti battere il ferro finché è caldo." - Publilio Siro
TEXT.Spanish: "Debes golpear el hierro cuando aún está al rojo vivo." - Publio Siro

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Iron Working[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] Resource and allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT].
Laser
"Nothing travels faster than the speed of light with the possible exception of bad news, which obeys its own special laws." - Douglas Adams
TEXT.French: "Rien ne voyage plus vite que la lumière, sauf éventuellement les mauvaises nouvelles, qui obéissent à leurs propres lois." - Douglas Adams
TEXT.German: "Nichts bewegt sich schneller als das Licht, außer möglicherweise schlechte Nachrichten, die ihren eigenen, besonderen Gesetzen gehorchen." - Douglas Adams
TEXT.Italian: "Niente viaggia più veloce della luce, con la possibile eccezione delle cattive notizie, che obbediscono a proprie leggi speciali." - Douglas Adams
TEXT.Spanish: "Nada viaja más deprisa que la luz, con la posible excepción de las malas noticias, que obedecen sus propias leyes". - Douglas Adams

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Laser[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mobile SAMs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mobile Artillery[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to construct the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT] Project.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tech Lead:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Technologievorsprung:[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Liberalism
"Any society that would give up a little liberty to gain a little security will deserve neither and lose both." - Benjamin Franklin
TEXT.French: "Une société prête à sacrifier un peu de liberté contre un peu de sécurité ne mérite ni l'une ni l'autre et finit par perdre les deux !" - Benjamin Franklin
TEXT.German: "Eine Gesellschaft, die ihre Freiheit zugunsten der Sicherheit opfert, hat beides nicht verdient." - Benjamin Franklin
TEXT.Italian: "Qualsiasi società che sacrifica un po' di libertà per una maggiore sicurezza non si merita nessuna delle due cose e le perde entrambe." - Benjamin Franklin
TEXT.Spanish: "Cualquier sociedad que renuncie a un poco de libertad para obtener algo de seguridad no se merece ni una ni otra y acabará perdiendo ambas." - Benjamin Franklin

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Liberalism[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Republic[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Secularism[COLOR_REVERT] Civics. The first to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Liberalism[COLOR_REVERT] receives a free technology from you current or earlier era.
Literature
"Some books are to be tasted, others to be swallowed, and some few to be chewed and digested." - Sir Francis Bacon
TEXT.French: "Certains livres se goûtent, d'autres se dévorent, d'autres encore se mâchent et se digèrent lentement." - Sir Francis Bacon
TEXT.German: "Manche Bücher müssen gekostet werden, manche verschlingt man, und nur einige wenige kaut man und verdaut sie ganz." - Sir Francis Bacon
TEXT.Italian: "Alcuni libri devono essere gustati, altri inghiottiti, altri divorati e digeriti." - Sir Francis Bacon
TEXT.Spanish: "Algunos libros se han de paladear, otros se han de engullir y unos cuantos más se han de masticar y digerir." - Sir Francis Bacon

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Literature[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Machinery
"A god from the machine" - Menander
TEXT.French: "La machine a enfanté un DIEU." - Menander
TEXT.German: "Deus ex machina." - Menander
TEXT.Italian: "La divinità delle macchine" - Menandro
TEXT.Spanish: "Deus ex machina." - Menandro

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Machinery[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowmen[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Windmill[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Watermill[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement, allows the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Canal[COLOR_REVERT].
Masonry
"It is from their foes, not their friends, that cities learn the lesson of building high walls." - Aristophanes
TEXT.French: "Ce sont leurs ennemis et non leurs amis qui ont enseigné aux cités à bâtir de hautes murailles !" - Aristophane
TEXT.German: "Nicht von ihren Freunden, sondern von ihren Feinden lernen Städte, hohe Mauern zu bauen." - Aristophanes
TEXT.Italian: "È dai nemici, non dagli amici, che le città imparano la lezione di costruire alte mura." - Aristofane
TEXT.Spanish: "Es de los enemigos, no de los amigos, que las ciudades aprenden la lección de construir murallas altas." - Aristófanes

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Masonry[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quarry[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement and enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slavery[COLOR_REVERT] Civic. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] Building, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.
Mass Media
"The only thing worse than being talked about is not being talked about." - Oscar Wilde
TEXT.French: "Qu'on parle de vous, c'est affreux. Mais il y a une chose pire : c'est qu'on n'en parle pas." - Oscar Wilde
TEXT.German: "Schlimmer als über jemanden zu reden, ist über jemanden nicht zu reden!" - Oscar Wilde
TEXT.Italian: "L'unica cosa peggiore del parlare di qualcosa, è non parlarne affatto." - Oscar Wilde
TEXT.Spanish: "En este mundo lo único peor que soportar que hablen de ti es que no se diga nada." - Oscar Wilde

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mass Media[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Tower[COLOR_REVERT] Building, [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CN Tower[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Public Welfare[COLOR_REVERT] Civic.
Mathematics
"If in other sciences we should arrive at certainty without doubt and truth without error, it behooves us to place the foundations of knowledge in mathematics." - Roger Bacon
TEXT.French: "La science vise une certitude qui ne souffre aucun doute, une vérité qui ne souffre aucune erreur, les mathématiques s'imposent donc comme les fondations de toute science." - Roger Bacon
TEXT.German: "Nur mithilfe der Mathematik kann man wirklich wissen, denn in jeder Wissenschaft ist nur so viel an Wahrheit enthalten, wie in ihr Mathematik steckt." - Roger Bacon
TEXT.Italian: "Se in altre scienze è probabile raggiungere la certezza senza dubbio e senza errore, è giusto porre le fondamenta del sapere nella matematica." - Roger Bacon
TEXT.Spanish: "Si en las demás ciencias hubiéramos de obtener la certeza sin dudas y la verdad sin errores, nos correspondería basar el conocimiento en las Matemáticas." - Roger Bacon

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT] Building, allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fort[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement and allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapults[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases the production gained from chopping forests. The first player to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT].
Medicine
"As to diseases make a habit of two things - to help, or at least, to do no harm." - Hippocrates
TEXT.French: "Il faut s'exercer, dans le domaine des maladies, à deux choses : être utile, sinon ne pas nuire." - Hippocrate
TEXT.German: "Was Krankheiten betrifft, so hat man zwei Möglichkeiten: zu heilen oder wenigstens nicht zu schaden." - Hippokrates
TEXT.Italian: "Per debellare le malattie ci vogliono cose in grado di aiutare o, al massimo, non nuocere." - Ippocrate
TEXT.Spanish: "En cuanto a las enfermedades, ten por costumbre dos cosas: ayudar o, al menos, no hacer más daño." - Hipócrates

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Medicine[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospital[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross Society[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder.
Meditation
"Meditation brings wisdom; lack of meditation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what holds you back." - The Buddha
TEXT.French: "Le sage s'adonne à la méditation ; l'ignorant s'y refuse. Apprends à reconnaître ce qui te fait avancer et ce qui entrave ta progression." - Bouddha
TEXT.German: "Meditation bedeutet Weisheit. Mangelnde Meditation bedeutet Ignoranz. Wisse, was dich voranbringt oder hemmt." - Buddha
TEXT.Italian: "La meditazione porta saggezza. La mancanza di meditazione rende ignoranti. Impara bene ciò che può migliorarti e ciò che può peggiorarti." - Budda
TEXT.Spanish: "La meditación trae la sabiduría y su carencia conlleva ignorancia. Has de conocer bien lo que te hace avanzar y lo que te frena." - Buda

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Meditation[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct Religious [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]. The first player to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Meditation[COLOR_REVERT] founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT].
Metal Casting
"And them that take the sword shall perish by the sword." - The Bible, Matthew
TEXT.French: "Et ceux qui auront vécu par l'épée périront par l'épée." - La Bible, Matthieu
TEXT.German: "Wer das Schwert nimmt, der soll durchs Schwert umkommen." - Die Bibel, Matthäus
TEXT.Italian: "Chi di spada ferisce, di spada perisce." - La Bibbia, Matteo
TEXT.Spanish: "Quien toma la espada, a espada morirá." - La Biblia, San Mateo

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Metal Casting[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Workshop[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement and allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremes[COLOR_REVERT].
Military Science
"I must study politics and war that my sons may have liberty to study mathematics and philosophy." - John Adams
TEXT.French: "Je dois étudier la politique et me battre pour que mes fils puissent être libres d'étudier les mathématiques et la philosophie." - John Adams
TEXT.German: "Ich muss Politik und Krieg studieren, damit meine Söhne die Freiheit haben, Mathematik und Philosophie zu studieren." - John Adams
TEXT.Italian: "Devo studiare politica e arte della guerra in modo che i miei figli possano avere la libertà di studiare matematica e filosofia". - John Adams
TEXT.Spanish: "Debo estudiar las artes de la política y la guerra para que mis hijos puedan estudiar las de las matemáticas y la filosofía". - John Adams

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Science[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frigates[COLOR_REVERT] and allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] Building. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Blitz[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Commando[COLOR_REVERT] Promotions and enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Naval Dominance[COLOR_REVERT] Civic.
Military Tradition
"Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win." - Sun-Tzu
TEXT.French: "Le vainqueur triomphe avant même de partir à la guerre, le vaincu part à la guerre puis rêve de triomphe." - Sun-Tzu
TEXT.German: "Der General, der eine Schlacht gewinnt, stellt vor dem Kampf viele Berechnungen an. Der General, der verliert, stellt vorher kaum Berechnungen an." - Sun-Tzu
TEXT.Italian: "I guerrieri vittoriosi prima vincono e poi vanno in guerra; quelli sconfitti, prima vanno in guerra e poi cercano di vincere." - Sun-Tzu
TEXT.Spanish: "Los guerreros vencedores ganan primero y luego van a la guerra, mientras que los perdedores van a la guerra primero y luego pretenden ganar." - Sun Tzu

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassier[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to construct [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]St. Basil's Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harmandir Sahib[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It enables [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Defensive Pacts[COLOR_REVERT], enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standing Army[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Great Wall[COLOR_REVERT].
Mining
"The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones." - Confucius
TEXT.French: "L'homme qui déplace une montagne commence par les petites pierres." - Confucius
TEXT.German: "Der Mann, der den Berg abtrug, war derselbe, der anfing, kleine Steine wegzutragen." - Konfuzius
TEXT.Italian: "Un uomo che deve spostare una montagna comincia dalle piccole pietre." - Confucio
TEXT.Spanish: "El hombre que mueve montañas empieza apartando piedrecitas." - Confucio

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mining[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mine[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Modernization:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Modernisierung:[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Monarchy
"A multitude of rulers is not a good thing. Let there be one ruler, one king." - Herodotus
TEXT.French: "Abondance de souverains nuit ! Il ne peut y en avoir qu'un, un seul Roi !" - Hérodote
TEXT.German: "Zu viele Herrscher sind nicht gut. Möge ein Herrscher als König regieren!" - Herodot
TEXT.Italian: "Non servono molti sovrani. Che il comando sia di un uomo solo, che sia proclamato un re." - Erodoto
TEXT.Spanish: "No es bueno el caudillaje de muchos; sea uno solo el caudillo, uno solo el rey." - Herodoto

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Monarchy[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephants[COLOR_REVERT], enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dynasticism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassal States[COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winery[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement.
Monotheism
"I am the Lord thy God. Thou shalt have no other gods before Me." - The Bible, Exodus
TEXT.French: "Je suis le Seigneur, ton Dieu. Tu n'adoreras pas d'autre Dieu que moi." - La Bible, l'Exode
TEXT.German: "Ich bin der Herr, dein Gott. Du sollst nicht haben andere Götter neben mir." - Die Bibel, Exodus
TEXT.Italian: "Io sono il Signore. Non avrai altro Dio all'infuori di me." - La Bibbia - Esodo
TEXT.Spanish: "Yo soy Yavé, tu Dios. No tendrás otro Dios que a mí." - La Biblia, Éxodo

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Monotheism[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Organized Religion[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT]. The first player to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Monotheism[COLOR_REVERT] founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT].
Music
"If music be the food of love, play on." - William Shakespeare
TEXT.French: "Si la musique nourrit l'amour, alors jouez !" - William Shakespeare
TEXT.German: "Wenn Musik die Nahrung der Liebe ist, so spielt fort." - William Shakespeare
TEXT.Italian: "Se la musica è il nutrimento dell'amore, continua a suonare." - William Shakespeare
TEXT.Spanish: "Si la música es el alimento del amor, tocadla." - William Shakespeare

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Music[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of Religious [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedrals[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Blue Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Mysticism
"Nature herself has imprinted on the minds of all the idea of God." - Cicero
TEXT.French: "Il y a des dieux parce que la nature en a imprimé la notion dans toutes les âmes." - Cicéron
TEXT.German: "Die Natur hat uns den Begriff der Götter selbst gegeben." - Cicero
TEXT.Italian: "La Natura stessa ha impresso nelle menti di tutti l'idea di Dio." - Cicerone
TEXT.Spanish: "La propia Naturaleza ha grabado en la mente de todos la idea de Dios." - Cicerón

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mysticism[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Nationalism
"A man does not have himself killed for a half-pence a day or for a petty distinction. You must speak to the soul in order to electrify him." - Napoleon Bonaparte
TEXT.French: "Un homme n'accepte pas de risquer sa vie pour deux sous par jour ou pour une médaille. Il faut parler à son âme, le galvaniser !" - Napoléon Bonaparte
TEXT.German: "Ein Mann riskiert nicht für einen jämmerlichen Sold sein Leben. Man muss seine Seele ansprechen, um ihn zu elektrisieren!" - Napoleon Bonaparte
TEXT.Italian: "Un uomo non rischia la vita per pochi soldi o per promozioni insignificanti. Per infervorarlo, bisogna parlare alla sua anima." - Napoleone Bonaparte
TEXT.Spanish: "Un hombre no está dispuesto a morir por medio penique al día ni por un quítame allá esas penas. Debes hablarle al alma para conmoverlo." - Napoleón Bonaparte

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Nationalism[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Autocracy[COLOR_REVERT] Civic, allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Gallery[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Olympic Park[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brandenburg Gate[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Apostolic Palace[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1_Num Turns[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1_Num tours[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1_Num Runden[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1_Num [NUM1:turno:turni][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1_Num [NUM1:turno:turnos][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsoletes [LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Rend la technologie "[LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK]" obsolète[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Veraltet: [LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK] [NUM1:diventa obsoleto:diventa obsoleta:diventano obsolete:diventano obsolete][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Deja [NUM1:obsoleto:obsoleta:obsoletos:obsoletas] [LINK=literal]%s1:2_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsoletes %s1_Name[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Rend la technologie "%s1_Name" obsolète[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Veraltet: %s1_Name[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1_Name diventa [NUM1:obsoleto:obsoleta][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Deja [NUM1:obsoleto:obsoleta:obsoletos:obsoletas] %s1:2_Name[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Optics
"One doesn't discover new lands without losing sight of the shore." - Andre Gide
TEXT.French: "Ne découvre de nouvelles terres, que celui qui sait quitter tout rivage." - André Gide
TEXT.German: "Man kann keine neuen Länder entdecken, ohne die Küste aus den Augen zu verlieren." - André Gide
TEXT.Italian: "Una persona non può scoprire nuove terre senza vederne la spiagge." - Andre Gide
TEXT.Spanish: "Uno no descubre nuevas tierras sin perder de vista la costa." - André Gide

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to construct the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whaling Boats[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement. It also increases your sight distance across water.
Paper
"I cannot live without books" - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.French: "Je ne peux pas vivre sans livres." - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.German: "Ohne Bücher kann ich nicht leben!" - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.Italian: "Non potrei vivere senza libri" - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.Spanish: "No puedo vivir sin libros." - Thomas Jefferson

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to trade world maps with other civilizations and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University of Sankore[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Patronage
"Art, as far as it is able, follows nature, as a pupil imitates his master; thus your art must be, as it were, God's grandchild." - Dante Alighieri

[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Patronage[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Leaning Tower[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Fort[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. The first to research [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Patronage[COLOR_REVERT] receives a free [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT] unit.
Philosophy
"I have gained this by philosophy: that I do without being commanded what others do only from fear of the law." - Aristotle
TEXT.French: "La philosophie m'a appris ceci : ce que je fais sans que l'on me l'ordonne, les autres le font par crainte de la loi." - Aristote
TEXT.German: "Dies habe ich durch Philosophie gewonnen. Dass ich tue, ohne befohlen zu werden, was andere nur aus Furcht vor dem Gesetz tun." - Aristoteles
TEXT.Italian: "Con la filosofia ho conquistato il diritto di fare ciò che voglio senza essere comandato da chi lo fa solo per timore della legge." - Aristotele
TEXT.Spanish: "Con la filosofía he logrado lo siguiente: hacer, sin que me lo ordenen, lo que otros hacen solamente por temor a la ley." - Aristóteles

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Philosophy[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scholasticism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Leaning Tower[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Mezquita[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Physics
"To every action there is always opposed an equal reaction." - Isaac Newton
TEXT.French: "A chaque action correspond une réaction égale." - Isaac Newton
TEXT.German: "Jede Aktion erzeugt gleichzeitig eine Reaktion." - Isaac Newton
TEXT.Italian: "Ad ogni azione, corrisponde una reazione uguale ma di segno opposto." - Isaac Newton
TEXT.Spanish: "Para cada acción existe siempre una reacción igual y de sentido contrario." - Isaac Newton

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Physics[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT] Resource. The first to research [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Physics[COLOR_REVERT] receives a free [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] unit.
Plastics
"I just want to say one word to you. Just one word: plastics." - Calder Willingham, The Graduate
TEXT.French: "Je ne vous dirai qu'un mot, un seul mot : plastique." - Calder Willingham, Le Lauréat
TEXT.German: "Ich sage nur ein Wort. Nur ein einziges Wort: Plastik!" - Calder Willingham, Die Reifeprüfung
TEXT.Italian: "Voglio solo dirti una parola. Una sola. Plastica." - Calder Willingham, Il Laureato
TEXT.Spanish: "Solo quiero decirle una palabra, una nada más: plástico." - Calder Willingham, El graduado

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Plastics[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Offshore Platform[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement, allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plant[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Three Gorges Dam[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT] Resources.
Polytheism
"Not at all similar are the race of the immortal gods and the race of men who walk upon the earth." - Homer
TEXT.French: "La race des Dieux Immortels n'est point semblable à celle des hommes qui marchent sur la Terre." - Homère
TEXT.German: "Die unsterblichen Götter haben nichts mit den Menschen, die auf Erden wandeln, gemein." - Homer
TEXT.Italian: "La razza degli dei immortali e quella degli uomini terreni non sempre si somigliano." - Omero
TEXT.Spanish: "No se parecen en absoluto la raza de los dioses inmortales y la raza de los hombres que hollan la Tierra." - Homero

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Polytheism[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Artemis[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pantheon[COLOR_REVERT] Civic.
Pottery
"Hath not the potter power over the clay, to make one vessel unto honor, and another unto dishonor?" - The Bible, Romans
TEXT.French: "Le potier n'a-t-il pas pouvoir sur l'argile pour faire de la même masse un vase à honneur et un autre à déshonneur ?" - La Bible, Epître aux Romains
TEXT.German: "Hat nicht ein Töpfer Macht über den Ton, aus demselben Klumpen ein Gefäß zu ehrenvollem und ein anderes zu nicht ehrenvollem Gebrauch zu machen?" - Die Bibel, Römer
TEXT.Italian: "Nelle mani dell'artigiano sta la capacità di creare vasi da giorno e vasi da notte." - La Bibbia, i Romani
TEXT.Spanish: "¿O es que no puede el alfarero hacer del mismo barro un vaso de honor y uno indecoroso?" - La Biblia, San Mateo, Epístola a los Romanos

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Pottery[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cottage[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement, allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granary[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terracotta Army[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Priesthood
