"The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make His face to shine upon you and be gracious to you; the Lord lift up His countenance upon you and give you peace." - The Bible, Numbers
TEXT.French: "Le Seigneur te bénit et te garde ; il tourne vers toi son visage et te sourit. Il fait briller sur toi sa lumière et te donne sa joie." - La Bible, Nombres 6.24
TEXT.German: "Der Herr segne euch und behüte euch! Der Herr lasse sein Angesicht leuchten über euch und sei euch gnädig! Der Herr erhebe sein Angesicht auf euch und gebe euch Frieden." - Die Bibel, Numeri
TEXT.Italian: "Il Signore ti benedice e ti conforta; gli occhi del Signore sono gentili e vegliano su di te; lo sguardo del Signore si volge verso di te e ti dona la pace." - La Bibbia
TEXT.Spanish: "El Señor te bendiga y te guarde. El Señor te muestre su rostro y tenga misericordia de ti. Vuelva el Señor su rostro hacia ti y te conceda la paz." - La Biblia, Números

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Priesthood[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build Religious [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shrine of Apollo[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Moai Statues[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.
Printing Press
[ICON_BULLET]First [LINK=RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY]Catholic[\LINK] Nation to Discover Begins the [LINK=RELIGION_JUDAISM]Reformation[\LINK]
"What gunpowder did for war, the printing press has done for the mind." - Wendell Phillips
TEXT.French: "La presse écrite a changé l'esprit comme la poudre à canon a changé la guerre." - Wendell Phillips
TEXT.German: "Was das Schießpulver für den Krieg war, ist die Druckerpresse für den Geist." - Wendell Phillips
TEXT.Italian: "La tipografia sta alla mente come la polvere da sparo sta alla guerra." - Wendell Phillips
TEXT.Spanish: "La imprenta ha hecho por la mente lo que la pólvora hizo por la guerra." - Wendell Phillips

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Printing Press[COLOR_REVERT] increases the gold output of all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Village[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Town[COLOR_REVERT] Improvements by 1. The first catholic player to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Printing Press[COLOR_REVERT] founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT].

[TAB]"In light of ever-increasing competition between advanced nations over resources with which to spur their struggling economies, the United States and China saw themselves locked in a dangerous dance as the 2060s passed. Both desperately sought expansion to mitigate the increasing turmoil caused by the economic collapse of the previous decade, and as a result each side's willingness to engage in negotiations diminished as conditions continued to deteriorate."[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]- Encyclopediae Galactica, History of the Earth and its Colonies
TEXT.French: [TAB]"La concurrence accrue entre les nations les plus développées pour le contrôle des ressources s'accentua encore après 2060. Les Etats-Unis et la Chine, en particulier, développèrent des politiques très agressives dans ce sens. Ces deux nations cherchèrent par tous les moyens à se relever du chaos économique dans lequel elles avaient été plongées quelques années plus tôt, et leurs relations se détériorèrent rapidement."[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]- Encyclopédie galactique, Histoire de la Terre et de ses colonies
TEXT.German: [TAB]"Angesichts des immer härter werdenden Wettbewerbs der fortschrittlichen Länder um die Ressourcen, die zur Steigerung der Wirtschaft benötigt werden, befanden sich die USA und China am Ende der 2060er Jahre in einer gefährlichen Situation. Beide Nationen versuchten verzweifelt zu expandieren, um die Folgen des Wirtschaftszusammenbruchs des vorhergehenden Jahrzehnts abzumildern. Die Verhandlungsbereitschaft sank auf beiden Seiten mit der Verschlechterung der Zustände."[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]- Encyclopedia Galactica, Geschichte der Erde und ihrer Kolonien
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]"Alla luce della crescente competizione tra le nazioni sviluppate per accaparrarsi risorse con cui sostenere le proprie economie in difficoltà, intorno al 2060 gli Stati Uniti e la Cina si trovarono in una situazione pericolosa. Entrambi cercavano di espandersi per mitigare i tumulti causati dal collasso economico della precedente decade, e per questo la volontà di negoziare di ciascuna parte andò progressivamente diminuendo, mentre le condizioni continuavano a deteriorarsi."[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]- Enciclopedia Galattica, storia della Terra e delle sue colonie
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]"En vista de la pujante competitividad entre las naciones avanzadas por los recursos con que estimular sus economías enfrentadas, los Estados Unidos y China acabaron trabados en un peligroso baile durante los años 60 del tercer milenio. Ambas naciones buscaban desesperadamente la expansión para mitigar la agitación creciente, causada por el colapso económico de la década anterior. Como consecuencia, la voluntad de ponerse a negociar disminuyó por ambas partes y la situación siguió deteriorándose."[NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]- Enciclopedia Galáctica, "Historia de la Tierra y sus colonias"

TEXT.English: Radio
"Then one fine mornin' she puts on a New York station. You know her life was saved by Rock 'n' Roll." - The Velvet Underground, "Rock And Roll"
TEXT.French: "Et un matin, elle écouta une station de New York, et sa vie fut sauvée par le Rock'n'roll !" - The Velvet Underground (Rock And Roll)
TEXT.German: "Es gibt in allen Funkhäusern Leute, die nichts zu tun haben, aber das richtig gehetzt." - Robert Lembke
TEXT.Italian: "Poi, una mattina, si sintonizzò su una stazione radio di New York. La sua vita venne salvata dal rock 'n' roll." - The Velvet Underground, "Rock And Roll"
TEXT.Spanish: "La radio no tiene futuro, los rayos X resultarán una farsa y las máquinas voladoras más pesadas que el aire son imposibles." - William Thomson

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Radio[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombers[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wembley[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Graceland[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Multilateralism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic
Railroad
"I fooled you, I fooled you, I got pig iron, I got pig iron, I got all pig iron." - Lonnie Donegan, "Rock Island Line"
TEXT.French: "Je t'ai roulé, je t'ai roulé, je t'ai roulé, j'ai eu la fonte, j'ai eu la fonte, j'ai eu la fonte." - Chanson de Lonnie Donegan (Rock Island Line)
TEXT.German: "Eine Eisenbahn besteht zu 95% aus Menschen und zu 5% aus Eisen." - Adam Smith
TEXT.Italian: "Due rotaie che corrono parallele, per un viaggio pieno di traversine." - Lonnie Donegan, "Rock Island Line"
TEXT.Spanish: "El tren camina y camina, y la máquina resuella, y tose con tos ferina. ¡Vamos en una centella!" - Antonio Machado

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Gunners[COLOR_REVERT] and allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Westminster Palace[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. It also allows you to construct the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement.
Reformation
"Peace if possible, truth at all costs." - Martin Luther
The [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Reformation[COLOR_REVERT] sparks a great schism in Christianity!
Refrigeration
"Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you what you are." - Anthelme Brillat-Savarin
TEXT.French: "Dis-moi ce que tu manges et je te dirai qui tu es !" - Anthelme Brillat-Savarin
TEXT.German: "Der Mensch ist, was er isst." - Anthelme Brillat-Savarin
TEXT.Italian: "Dimmi cosa mangi e ti dirò chi sei." - Anthelme Brillat-Savarin
TEXT.Spanish: "Dime lo que comes y te diré quién eres." - Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Refrigeration[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT] Building. It increases the food production of all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pasture[COLOR_REVERT] Improvements by 1 and allows the spread of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Industry[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases your water units' movement speed.
Replaceable Parts
"The whole is more than the sum of its parts." - Aristotle
TEXT.French: "La totalité est plus que la somme des parties." - Aristote
TEXT.German: "Das Ganze ist größer als die Summe seiner Teile." - Aristoteles
TEXT.Italian: "Il risultato è migliore della somma delle sue parti." - Aristotele
TEXT.Spanish: "Un todo es más que la suma de sus partes." - Aristóteles

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Replaceable Parts[COLOR_REVERT] increases the production output of all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Windmill[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Watermill[COLOR_REVERT] Improvements by 1. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Grand Canal[COLOR_REVERT].
Rifling
"Political power grows out of the barrel of a gun." - Mao Zedong
TEXT.French: "Le pouvoir politique sort du canon d'un fusil." - Mao Tsé-Tung
TEXT.German: "Alle politische Macht rührt von einem Gewehrlauf." - Mao Tsetung
TEXT.Italian: "Il potere politico nasce dalla canna di un fucile." - Mao Tse Tung
TEXT.Spanish: "El poder político nace de los cañones de los fusiles." - Mao Zedong

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Riflemen[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brandenburg Gate[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Temple of Kukulkan[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Himeji Castle[COLOR_REVERT].
Robotics
"The real problem is not whether machines think, but whether men do." - B.F. Skinner
TEXT.French: "La vraie question n'est pas de savoir si les machines pensent mais si les humains pensent." - B.F. Skinner
TEXT.German: "Das eigentliche Problem ist nicht, ob Maschinen denken können, sondern ob Menschen es können." - B.F. Skinner
TEXT.Italian: "Il problema non è se le macchine sono in grado di pensare, ma se lo è l'uomo." - B.F. Skinner
TEXT.Spanish: "El verdadero problema no es si las máquinas piensan, sino si los hombres lo hacen." - B. F. Skinner

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Robotics[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mechanized Infantry[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile Cruisers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Bombers[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
Rocketry
"The Earth is the cradle of the mind, but one cannot eternally live in a cradle." - Konstantin E. Tsiolkovsky
TEXT.French: "La Terre est le berceau de l'humanité, mais qui veut passer sa vie entière dans un berceau ?" - Konstantin Tsiolkovsky
TEXT.German: "Die Erde ist die Wiege der Menschheit, aber welches Kind bleibt schon ewig in seiner Wiege." - Konstantin E. Ciolkowski
TEXT.Italian: "La Terra è la culla della mente... ma non si può vivere sempre in una culla..." - Konstantin E. Tsiolkovksy
TEXT.Spanish: "La Tierra es la cuna de la Humanidad, pero no puedes vivir en una cuna eternamente." - Konstantín E. Tsiolkovksi

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rocketry[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Anti-Tanks[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sam Infantry[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guided Missiles[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tactical Nukes[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT]. It allows the construction of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Space Program[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Sailing
"You can't direct the wind, but you can adjust your sails." - Unknown
TEXT.French: "On ne peut pas faire tourner le vent, mais on peut faire tourner ses voiles." - Inconnu
TEXT.German: "Den Wind vermagst du nicht zu lenken, deine Segel wohl." - Unbekannt
TEXT.Italian: "Non puoi cambiare la direzione del vento, ma puoi orientare le tue vele." - Rhye
TEXT.Spanish: "No puedes dirigir el viento, pero puedes mover las velas de tu barco." - Proverbio chino

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Sailing[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleys[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremes[COLOR_REVERT]. It also enables trading along coasts and rivers, allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT] Building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.
Satellites
"Beep...beep...beep...beep..." - Sputnik I
TEXT.French: "Bip... bip... bip... bip..." - Spoutnik I
TEXT.German: "Beep ... Beep ... Beep ... Beep." - Sputnik I.
TEXT.Italian: "Bip...bip... bip... bip" - Sputnik I
TEXT.Spanish: "Bip... bip... bip... bip..." - Sputnik I

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Satellites[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the world map. It allows the construction of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder and allows you to construct the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Docking Bay[COLOR_REVERT] Spaceship Part.
Scientific Method
"I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use." - Galileo Galilei
TEXT.French: "J'ai du mal à croire que le même Dieu qui nous a dotés d'esprit, de raison et d'intelligence puisse vouloir que nous y renoncions." - Galilée
TEXT.German: "Ich fühle mich nicht zu dem Glauben verpflichtet, dass derselbe Gott, der uns mit Sinnen, Vernunft und Verstand ausgestattet hat, von uns verlangt, dieselben nicht zu benutzen." - Galileo Galilei
TEXT.Italian: "Non sono obbligato a credere che lo stesso Dio che ci ha donato il senso, la ragione e l'intelligenza voleva che ne dimenticassimo l_uso." - Galileo Galilei
TEXT.Spanish: "No me siento obligado a creer que el mismo Dios que nos ha dotado de sentido común, raciocinio e intelecto tuviera como intención privarnos de su uso." - Galileo Galilei

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Scientific Method[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] Resource, allows the construction of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] Improvement and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatory[COLOR_REVERT] Building. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Temple of Artemis[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Red Fort[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rise of Civilization:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aufstieg der Zivilisation:[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tech Spread:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Technologieverbreitung:[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Stealth
"Behind a veil, unseen yet present, I was the forceful soul that moved this mighty body." - Jean Racine
TEXT.French: "Derrière un voile, invisible et présente, j'étais de ce grand corps l'âme toute-puissante." - Jean Racine
TEXT.German: "Hinter einem Schleier, unsichtbar aber doch vorhanden, war ich der mächtige Geist, der diesen kräftigen Körper bewegte." - Jean Racine
TEXT.Italian: "Dietro un velo, invisibile ma presente, ero la vigorosa anima che muoveva questo poderoso corpo." - Jean Racine
TEXT.Spanish: "Tras un velo, invisible más que presente, yo era el alma rectora que movía este poderoso cuerpo". - Jean Racine

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Stealth[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT].
Steam Power
"You would make a ship sail against the winds and currents by lighting a bon-fire under her deck? I have no time for such nonsense." - Napoleon, on Robert Fulton's Steamship
TEXT.French: "Vous feriez avancer un navire contre vents et courants en allumant un brasier sous le pont ? Je n'ai pas de temps à perdre avec de telles inepties." - Napoléon parlant du bateau à vapeur de Robert Fulton
TEXT.German: "Was veranlasst Sie zu der Annahme, dass ein Schiff gegen den Wind und gegen die Strömung segeln könnte, wenn man nur ein Feuer unter Deck anzünde? Ich habe keine Zeit, mir so einen Unsinn anzuhören." - Napoleon über Robert Fultons Dampfschiff
TEXT.Italian: "Quindi per far andare una nave controvento dovresti accendere un fuoco nella stiva? Non ho tempo per queste idiozie." - Napoleone a proposito della nave a vapore di Robert Fulton
TEXT.Spanish: "-¿Usted haría barcos que navegaran contra las corrientes y los vientos con solo encender una caldera bajo la cubierta? ­Discúlpeme, no tengo tiempo para escuchar tonterías." - Napoleón, hablando del barco a vapor de Robert Fulton

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steam Power[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT] Resource, causes workers to build improvements 50% faster and allows the spread of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Textile Industry[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ironclads[COLOR_REVERT] and allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levee[COLOR_REVERT] Building.
Steel
"Before that steam drill shall beat me down, I'll die with my hammer in my hand." - from "John Henry, the Steel-Driving Man"
TEXT.French: "Je mourrai le marteau à la main avant que la machine à vapeur ne me batte." - Chanson de John Henry (Steel-Driving Man)
TEXT.German: "Wenn dieser Dampfbohrer mich schlägt, sterbe ich mit dem Hammer in der Hand." - Aus "John Henry, Steel-Driving Man"
TEXT.Italian: "Piuttosto che farmi eliminare dalla trivella a vapore, morirò con il martello in mano." - da "John Henry, the Steel-Driving Man"
TEXT.Spanish: "Antes de que esa perforadora a vapor me derrote, moriré con el martillo en la mano." - De la balada popular norteamericana "John Henry, the Steel-Driving Man"

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steel[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ironclads[COLOR_REVERT], enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and allows the spread of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steel Industry[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydock[COLOR_REVERT] Building, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empire State Building[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.
"What is happiness? The feeling that power is growing, that resistance is overcome." - Friedrich Nietzsche
TEXT.French: "Qu'est-ce que le bonheur ? Le sentiment que la puissance croît, qu'une résistance est surmontée." - Friedrich Nietzsche
TEXT.German: "Was ist Glück? Das Gefühl davon, dass die Macht wächst, dass ein Widerstand überwunden wird." - Friedrich Nietzsche
TEXT.Italian: "Cos'è la felicità? La sensazione che la potenza cresce e che si sta superando una resistenza." - Friedrich Nietzsche
TEXT.Spanish: "¿Qué es la felicidad? La sensación de que el poder está creciendo y se superan las dificultades". - Friedrich Nietzsche

TEXT.English: Superconductors
[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Superconductors[COLOR_REVERT] allow the construction of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Thrusters[COLOR_REVERT] Spaceship Part.
The Wheel
"Put your shoulder to the wheel." - Aesop
TEXT.French: "La roue de la fortune tourne plus vite que celle du moulin." - Miguel de Cervantès
TEXT.German: "Das Rad der Zeit lässt sich nicht zurückdrehen." - Sprichwort
TEXT.Italian: "Mettiti al lavoro di buona lena." - Esopo
TEXT.Spanish: "Arrima el hombro a la rueda." - Esopo

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]The Wheel[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariots[COLOR_REVERT] and allows the construction of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roads[COLOR_REVERT].
Theology
"Two cities have been formed by two loves: the earthly by the love of self; the heavenly by the love of God." - St. Augustine
TEXT.French: "Deux amours ont fait deux cités : l'amour de soi, la cité terrestre ; l'amour de Dieu, la cité céleste." - Saint-Augustin
TEXT.German: "Es gibt zwei Städte auf der Welt. Die eine ist auf der Liebe zu sich selbst, die andere auf der Liebe zu Gott errichtet." - Augustinus
TEXT.Italian: "Esistono due tipi di città, fondate su due tipi d'amore: quello terreno per sé stessi e quello celeste per di Dio." - Sant'Agostino
TEXT.Spanish: "Dos amores han fundado dos ciudades: el amor a uno mismo, la terrenal; y el amor a Dios, la celestial." - San Agustín

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Theology[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theocracy[COLOR_REVERT] civic and allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apostolic Palace[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Mezquita[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders. It also obsoletes the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT]. The first player to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Theology[COLOR_REVERT] founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT].
Communism
"When I give food to the poor, they call me a saint. When I ask why the poor have no food, they call me a communist." - Dom Helder Camara
TEXT.French: "Je nourris un pauvre et l'on me dit que je suis un saint. Je demande pourquoi le pauvre n'a pas de quoi se nourrir et l'on me traite de communiste !" - Dom Helder Camara
TEXT.German: "Gebe ich den Armen zu essen, nennen sie mich einen Heiligen. Frage ich, warum sie nichts zu essen haben, nennen sie mich einen Kommunisten!" - Dom Helder Camara
TEXT.Italian: "Quando offro il cibo ai poveri, mi chiamano santo. Quando chiedo perché i poveri non hanno cibo, mi chiamano comunista." - Dom Helder Camara
TEXT.Spanish: "Cuando doy comida a un pobre me llaman santo. Cuando pregunto por qué un pobre no tiene comida me llaman comunista." - Dom Hélder Câmara

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Communism[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Central Planning[COLOR_REVERT] Civic and obsoletes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]St. Basils Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Intelligence Agency[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Security Bureau[COLOR_REVERT] Buildings and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder. The first to research [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Communism[COLOR_REVERT] receives a free [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT] unit.
Writing
"True glory consists in doing what deserves to be written; in writing what deserves to be read." - Pliny the Elder
TEXT.French: "La gloire s'acquiert en accomplissant ce qui mérite d'être écrit et en écrivant ce qui mérite d'être lu." - Pline l'Ancien
TEXT.German: "Glücklich sind jene, die Taten vollbringen, die es wert sind, aufgezeichnet zu werden, oder Schriften verfassen, die es wert sind, gelesen zu werden." - Plinius der Ältere
TEXT.Italian: "La vera gloria consiste nel fare ciò che merita di essere scritto e nello scrivere ciò che merita di essere letto." - Plinio il Vecchio
TEXT.Spanish: "La verdadera gloria consiste en hacer lo que merece escribirse y en escribir lo que merece leerse." - Plinio el Viejo

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Writing[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT] Building and enables [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT].
